LanguageData.Hopper_silkworm.label: silkworm feeding box
LanguageData.Hopper_silkworm.description: Hold mulberry for feeding silkworms to make silk.
LanguageData.Hopper_silkworm_Blueprint.label: silkworm feeding box (blueprint)
LanguageData.Hopper_silkworm_Frame.label: silkworm feeding box (building)
LanguageData.Hopper_silkworm_Frame.description: Hold mulberry for feeding silkworms to make silk.
LanguageData.Silkworm_farm.label: Silkworm farm
LanguageData.Silkworm_farm.description: A farm for breeding silk worm. It should be 20~35 degree. You should build silkworm feeding box next to it.
LanguageData.Silkworm_farm_Blueprint.label: Silkworm farm (blueprint)
LanguageData.Silkworm_farm_Frame.label: Silkworm farm (building)
LanguageData.Silkworm_farm_Frame.description: A farm for breeding silk worm. It should be 20~35 degree. You should build silkworm feeding box next to it.
